resumeJson.summary: AI Engineer with 6+ years building ML/LLM systems and data platforms on GCP. Led production RAG and CV evaluation pipelines (orchestrator+BFF, schema validation, structured logging, cost tracking). Strong in Python, FastAPI, BigQuery, vector search, and cloud deployment (Cloud Run, CI/CD).

experience.title: AI Engineer (Lead)
highlights: Built orchestrator-based microservices for CV generation and resume evaluation; integrated Data API + LLM evaluator with stable contracts and camelCase normalization.
Reduced profile hydration latency from ~80s to ~3s using optimized BigQuery querying and caching strategy.
Implemented structured observability (correlation IDs, cost/latency logging) and error envelopes for frontend-safe responses.
Designed RAG retrieval pipeline (HyDE-style), embeddings, and scoring components for role/job recommendations.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
highlights: Delivered ML solutions across telecom/insurance/fintech; built feature pipelines and deployed models to production.
Partnered with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical design and measurable KPIs.

activities.name: Open-source / internal tooling
activities.details: Built reusable API test suites and schema validators for orchestrator services.
